item.title: Run Server error
item.dc:creator: @Smuds Smuds
item.description:
@Smuds wrote:

I changed the path to what it needs to be (change the 06 to 13) because I have jdk version 13. but the error still happens.

If this is to much of an inconvenience don’t worry but…
I think that I messed up the system variables which I don’t think I should’ve touched at all…
So if someone can tell me what they have in the CLASSPATH and PATH or whatever on the system variables that would be awsome. Thanks in advance.

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server error
item.dc:creator: @M_E_T_A_L M E T A L
item.description:
@M_E_T_A_L wrote:

OK this all depends on what Java version you have for intance if you have Version 11

Your Compile.bat file should say : Compiler
@echo off
title Compiler
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe
pause

And you classpath should say: CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%

And your Path should say: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;

P.s. You Run.bat file is fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server error
item.dc:creator: @Smuds Smuds
item.description:
@Smuds wrote:

Runserver…
@echo off
color 0a
title Allstar-Scape
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Compiler
@echo off
title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe” ./urlhere/*.java
pause

Classpath
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

Path
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;

Can you tell me if this is right in the System Variables right (I think this is the screw up, someone said I had to change something in here, but I don’t know…)

classpath
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

Path
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server error
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Edit your Compile.bat so that the path it uses is where your Java is (Change it to the correct Java version).
